title: MacKenzie's Last Fight with the Cheyennes: A Winter Campaign in Wyoming and Montana
description: The collections contained within the Combined Arms Research Library Digital Library are largely composed of digital versions of paper documents from the Combined Arms Research Library collections and student papers produced at the US Army Command and General Staff College. The documents in this collection cover the areas on the Vietnam Conflict, Korean War, and the U.S. Civil War, to name a few. This is one of those documents.
author: John G. Bourke
